title: A true relation of two most strange and fearefull accidents, lately happening the one at Chagford in Deuonshire, by the falling of th[e] Stanary Court-house, the 6. day of March last. The other at Branson within a mile of Burton vpon Trent in Staffordshire, this present yeare 1618.
author: Goodcole, Henry, 1586-1641, attributed name.
publisher: Printed [by J. White] for H. G[osson] and are to be sold by I. Wright, at the signe [of] the Bible without New-gate,
notes: Attributed to Henry Goodcole by Hazlitt.
Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Running title reads: Gods fearefull iudgement shewed in Deuonshire.
Imperfect; title page trimmed affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
